ygData.messageBody:
Omeg Felligan wrote:

>
> anyway...if anyone does find a way to hack please tell me, I started this
> whole silly thread ;). <--silly who's gonna hack it when they could just be
> playing instead :)
>

As I said before the game is fun and takes some time to get bored... I think
its too soon to ppl start hacking like that....
once ppl start getting really bored, some ppl will start having fun doing
something else... like code some cheat proggie
